description:
#koboldpress #dnd #terrain
Learn to make This LED terrain feature. A Shadow Dragon Well model for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the Shadow Dragon Well are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Make your Dungeons and Dragons table come alive by learning these easy but amazing crafting techniques.

This project also includes Scottyâ€™s philosophy of turning trash to treasure and some of the crafting materials used have been upcrafted from syrofoam carry out clam-shells. 

YOU WILL LEARN THESE CRAFTING TECHNIQUES IN THIS VIDEO:

-How to craft from throw away items.

-Using toys to enhance your terrain.

-Using ready made materials in your project to save time and effort.

-A great coating to strengthen styrofoam.

-A great way to prime your terrain without spray paint.

-Painting large miniatures with cheap craft paints.

-How to drybrush on black to bring out details 

Visit the KOBOLD PRESS WEBSITE: https://koboldpress.com/

Pick Up the Adventure module here: https://amzn.to/2nlR8af

STOCK UP FOR THIS CRAFT! (You help the channel with every purchase at no extra cost to you!)

Surebonder Gluegun: https://amzn.to/2KB1ooa

Surebonder Nozzle Replacements: https://amzn.to/2M3npBG

Surebonder All-Temp Glue Sticks: https://amzn.to/2vu9LwR

Black Gesso: https://amzn.to/2PWSqoS

Foam Beads: https://amzn.to/2ME7nOK

French Blue-Grey Craft Paint: https://amzn.to/2wDjZe2

Dragon Toys: https://amzn.to/2xzeeyA

Circle Templates(cheap option): https://amzn.to/2xvQICB

Circle Templates(more substantial): https://amzn.to/2plEvN8

Large LED Lights: https://amzn.to/2MNmP6F

You can pick up your Hot Wire Foam Factory supplies here. I use the sculpting tool,  Tensioner, Styrogoo and Bounce Rubberizer:  https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/home.php?bid=6&partner=32240

Craft Paint Set (Basic Colors): https://amzn.to/2OlJvfg

Craft Paint Set (Best Sellers): https://amzn.to/2OMtkJ3

Craft Paintbrush Set: https://amzn.to/2vpkLvM

WEBSITE: For more information on DM crafting and to get the tools you need to start or upgrade:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

THE TABLETOP CRAFTERS GUILD SITE:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

PATREON: Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

FACEBOOK: Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

TWITTER:  @TheDMsCraft

DISCLAIMER: This video and description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, Iâ€™ll receive a small commission. This helps support the channel and allows DM Scotty to continue to make videos for our community. Thank you for the support and Go Forth and Craft
